Package ohos.media.common

Class BufferInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.common.BufferInfo

  • public class BufferInfo
extends Object
    Describes buffer metadata, including the start offset, size, timestamp, and type of buffer data.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int BUFFER_TYPE_CODEC_CONFIG
      Indicates the codec initialization data or non-media data.
      static int BUFFER_TYPE_END_OF_STREAM
      Indicates the end of a data stream.
      static int BUFFER_TYPE_KEY_FRAME
      Indicates that buffer data is key frames.
      static int BUFFER_TYPE_MUXER_DATA
      Indicates that the buffer contains non-media data processed by a muxer.
      static int BUFFER_TYPE_PARTIAL_FRAME
      Indicates that the buffer contains only a part of a frame.
      int bufferType
      Indicates the buffer data type.
      int offset
      Indicates the buffer data offset.
      int size
      Indicates the buffer data size.
      long timeStamp
      Indicates the buffer data timestamp (in microseconds).

      • bufferType

        public int bufferType
        Indicates the buffer data type. Example values: BUFFER_TYPE_KEY_FRAME or BUFFER_TYPE_MUXER_DATA.
